segments.text: My warmest congratulations on your promotion !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . It ’ s nothing special actually .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t say that . It owes to your efforts and team spirit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it was nothing . Anyone could have done it . I still have a lot to learn yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are very modest . Best luck in your new position .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I won ’ t let this promotion change me .
segments.speaker: S2
